results.name: Number of partitions of n into at most 9 parts.
comment: For n > 8: also number of partitions of n into parts <= 9: a(n) = A026820(n, 9). - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jan 21 2010
reference: A. Cayley, Collected Mathematical Papers. Vols. 1-13, Cambridge Univ. Press, London, 1889-1897, Vol. 10, p. 415.
H. Gupta et al., Tables of Partitions. Royal Society Mathematical Tables, Vol. 4, Cambridge Univ. Press, 1958, p. 2.
